trans-unit.source: Represents a callback that is used to customize hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en tilbakeringing som brukes til å tilpasse treffprosent testing.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] invokes the HitTestResultCallback to report hit test intersections to the user.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]Aktiverer HitTestResultCallback for å rapportere treffprosent test skjæringspunktet for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The hit test callback method defines the actions that you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: Metoden treffprosent test tilbakeringing definerer handlingene som utføres når en treffprosent test identifiseres for et bestemt visual objekt i visual treet.

trans-unit.source: After you perform the actions, your callback is expected to return a <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior> value that determines whether to continue iterating through the visual tree for any other visual objects.
trans-unit.target: Når du har utført handlinger, tilbakeringing forventes å returnere en <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior>verdi som bestemmer om du vil fortsette gjentakelse visual treet for alle andre visuelle objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior>
